桰字的基本解释

桰
guā
古同“栝”。

桰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《集韻》古活切，入末，見。］
(1)矫正曲木的工具。后作“栝”。
(2)箭未端扣弦处。
(3)同“檜”。

桰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桰； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页527第02
【廣韻】古活切，音栝。【說文】櫽也。一曰矢桰，築弦處。　又同栝。木名。詳栝字註。

桰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桰字的起名意思

矫正曲木的工具。后作"栝；箭未端扣弦处；同"桧"。

Radon
Basic explanation of words
Radon
guā
The ancient same "Tian".
Radon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Jiyun" is ancient and lively, enter the end, see. ]
(1) Tools for correcting bent wood. Later it was named "Cotton".
(2) At the end of the arrow where the string is buckled.
(3) Same as "Juniper".
Radon
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桰; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 527 02
[Guang Yun] Ancient and lively, sound. [Said the text] Xia Ye. One said the arrow radon, where the string was built.　The same again. Wooden name. Detailed notes on the words.

Name meaning
Tools to correct bent wood. Later made "Cypress"; the end of the arrow buckles the string; the same as "Cypress".
